archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1054
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want the ability to capture a view of inconsistencies in payments (ie build up a history of those regularly paying into the wrong account) so the system can then reference this for future payments and assign before it goes into suspense

properties.value: Can you briefly describe whole process for payments?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
